Detailed Description

Class for handling BinarySearchTrees.

The tree is balanced by using red/black properties. NULL sentinels are used as leafs instead of NULL pointers. To walk through all nodes, find the node with lowest key with getMin() and then use the suc() function of the node. Alt. use getMax() and pred().

See also:
BinarySearchTreeNode
